org.radarbase.management.security.jwt

Class ManagementPortalJwtAccessTokenConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarbase.management.security.jwt.ManagementPortalJwtAccessTokenConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JwtAccessTokenConverter, org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.AccessTokenConverter, org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.TokenEnhancer

    public class ManagementPortalJwtAccessTokenConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements JwtAccessTokenConverter
    Implementation of JwtAccessTokenConverter for the RADAR-base ManagementPortal platform.

    This class can accept an EC keypair as well as an RSA keypair for signing. EC signatures are significantly smaller than RSA signatures.

      • ManagementPortalJwtAccessTokenConverter

        public ManagementPortalJwtAccessTokenConverter(com.auth0.jwt.algorithms.Algorithm algorithm,
                                               java.util.List<com.auth0.jwt.JWTVerifier> verifiers,
                                               java.util.List<com.auth0.jwt.JWTVerifier> refreshTokenVerifiers)
        Default constructor. Creates ManagementPortalJwtAccessTokenConverter with DefaultAccessTokenConverter as the accessTokenConverter with explicitly including grant_type claim.

      • enhance

        public org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken enhance(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken accessToken,
                                                                            org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.OAuth2Authentication authentication)
        Simplified the existing enhancing logic of TokenEnhancer.enhance(OAuth2AccessToken, OAuth2Authentication). Keeping the same logic.

        It mainly adds token-id for access token and access-token-id and token-id for refresh token to the additional information.

        Specified by:
        enhance in interface org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.TokenEnhancer
        Parameters:
        accessToken - accessToken to enhance.
        authentication - current authentication of the token.
        Returns:
        enhancedToken.

        Description copied from interface: JwtAccessTokenConverter
        Checks whether a token is access-token or refresh-token. Based on additional-information ati which contains the reference to access token of a refresh token.
